info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 8:54PM EDT until June 13 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Northeastern St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Southwestern Cass County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 853 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edwardsburg to near Georgetown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Goshen, Georgetown, Granger, Dunlap, Simonton Lake, Middlebury, Osceola, Wakarusa, Bristol, Edwardsburg, Millersburg, New Paris, Benton, Indian Village, Adamsville, Juno Lake and Jimtown. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 78 and 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
